programme.title: Carter Playboy interview, September 1976
programme.short_synopsis: Carter Playboy interview. Public reaction to Carter's 'adultery in my heart' admission.
programme.medium_synopsis: Carter Playboy interview. Public reaction to Carter's 'adultery in my heart' admission.
programme.long_synopsis:
Carter Playboy interview. Public reaction to Carter's 'adultery in my heart' admission.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
